title: Pixel 3XL battery Indicator Stuck At 100% Post 5thMay 2020 update
content:
My phone was working fine until 5th May 2020 monthly update. Now,Battery Indicator stuck to 100%. 
Entire day it is at 100%(During charge & Use) and phone automatically shuts down when battery is over. One good thing, phone is charging but it starts from 100% and it keeps on charging even put for long duration higher than 2hr30min(max time for complete charge) . 
Have done soft and hard reset but nothing resolved. Battery is charging and after update it happened, so it is related to software only.
Anyone Facing this issue....If resolved, kindly help?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
